name: Square Root (Tirion Games)
description:
Square Root is a simplistic, action platformer made entirely with simple shapes. Dodge falling squares, jump over spinning triangles and bounce on jump pads to make it to the flag in the least time possible! 

Be warned, however, for this simple yet addicting platformer may take you a while to complete as it is a very challenging title. Amazing reflexes and incredible timing are both needed to complete Square Root!

Please do not feel pressured to make a donation of any kind, the game is completely free and made to be enjoyed by anyone. :)

The game and all its assets were created by Mikael Christodoulides.

Project completed on 6/17/2020.
